plot: Compilation of scenes from Buster Keaton's films. The films are: The Butcher Boy; Fatty at Coney Island; Good Night Nurse!; One Week; The Scarecrow; Neighbors; Cops; The Playhouse; The Boat...
title: The Golden Age of Buster Keaton
